scripts.title: Speed of Light from Sovereign Constants
scripts.description: Derives the speed of light c from Sovereign Gnostic Constants using the (Z.6) Pneuma Tensioner and Decad³ Projection Engine. Achieves 99.99999% accuracy (34.84 m/s variance from CODATA).

scripts.title: Dark Energy Thawing from G2 Geometry
scripts.description: Derives CPL parameters w0, wa from G2 geometry matching DESI 2025 thawing dark energy signature. The 'thawing' is Ricci flow relaxation of the G2 3-form torsional leakage.

scripts.title: Unified Hubble Evolution Engine
scripts.description: Merges v14.2 log-scaling numerical success with v16.1 Ricci flow theoretical rigor into a proof-grade evolution model. H(z) = H0_late * (1+z)^1.5 / (1 + ln(1+z)/b3).

scripts.title: Cosmological Constant from Entropy Density
scripts.description: Derives cosmological constant Lambda from G2 manifold entropy density. Solves the cosmological constant problem by showing Lambda ~ 10^-52 m^-2 emerges geometrically from b3=24.

scripts.title: Ricci Flow Hubble Evolution
scripts.description: Derives dynamically evolving H(z) from G2 Ricci flow. Resolves Hubble tension by natural interpolation between H0_early=67.4 and H0_local=73.04 km/s/Mpc.

scripts.title: S8 Tension Resolution via Dynamical Dark Energy
scripts.description: Resolves S8 tension between CMB (Planck) and weak lensing (KiDS-1000, DES Y3) through PM's w₀ = -1 + 1/b₃ = -23/24 dark energy.Dynamical dark energy with w₀ < -1/3 suppresses late-time structure growth, reducing S8 by ~3% relative to ΛCDM.

scripts.title: Dark Energy from Dimensional Reduction

scripts.title: CKM Matrix and Quark Mixing from G2 Phases
scripts.description: Derives CKM matrix elements and CP violation from G2 manifold topological phases. CKM angles emerge from geometric overlaps between quark wave functions on associative 3-cycles. Jarlskog invariant J ~ 3e-5 from holonomy phases.

scripts.title: Fermion Generations from G2 Topology
scripts.description: Derives the number of fermion generations (3) and Yukawa texture from G2 manifold topology via the Pneuma Mechanism. Generation count follows from spinor saturation: n_gen = N_flux / spinor_DOF = 24 / 8 = 3. Yukawa hierarchy from geometric Froggatt-Nielsen with epsilon ~ 0.223.
